<h3 id="X38058">X(38058) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(1), X(8), X(12)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (b+c)*(2*a^3-3*(b+c)*a^2-2*(b^2-b*c+c^2)*a+3*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c))  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38058) = X(1)-4*X(6668) = X(8)+2*X(37737) = 2*X(10)+X(12) = X(355)+2*X(31659) = X(2975)-7*X(9780) = 5*X(5818)+X(11491) = 3*X(38027)-4*X(38062) = X(38027)+2*X(38100) = X(38027)-4*X(38105) = 3*X(38027)+4*X(38214) = X(38033)+2*X(38178) = X(38039)+2*X(38129) = X(38039)-4*X(38183) = X(38056)+2*X(38212) = 2*X(38062)+3*X(38100) = X(38062)-3*X(38105) = X(38100)+2*X(38105) = 3*X(38100)-2*X(38214) = X(38129)+2*X(38183) = 2*X(38134)+X(38157) = X(38203)+2*X(38217)</b>
<p>X(38058) lies on these lines: {1,6668}, {2,952}, {5,3877}, {8,31479}, {10,12}, {11,3898}, {21,18357}, {55,12690}, {80,5426}, {140,4881}, {214,5326}, {355,7483}, {392,10175}, {405,5818}, {443,20060}, {474,2975}, {495,3873}, {515,21155}, {516,38160}, {517,17530}, {518,38056}, {519,38027}, {528,38103}, {529,19875}, {860,7140}, {1125,37734}, {1145,2886}, {1482,6933}, {1512,8226}, {1537,6980}, {1621,12019}, {1698,4999}, {1737,3742}, {1772,24434}, {1962,37715}, {2476,5690}, {2802,38219}, {3158,3419}, {3214,31880}, {3434,12732}, {3614,3878}, {3617,3940}, {3634,17614}, {3679,5855}, {3826,38211}, {3828,31157}, {3869,10592}, {3880,10039}, {3884,7173}, {3890,10593}, {3892,15888}, {3894,37719}, {3897,37705}, {3899,7951}, {3943,21943}, {4187,9956}, {4512,5587}, {5141,22791}, {5260,37308}, {5432,10609}, {5657,17532}, {5724,17734}, {5730,10588}, {5844,38045}, {5846,38051}, {5847,38198}, {5849,38047}, {5850,38208}, {5852,38052}, {5853,38061}, {5854,38063}, {5857,38057}, {5901,7504}, {6684,30264}, {6871,12702}, {6910,18525}, {7705,17527}, {8728,25005}, {10827,26066}, {10959,17606}, {11112,21165}, {12647,25416}, {13373,17529}, {17549,28186}, {17575,17619}, {17577,28174}, {17665,34501}, {18395,25466}, {19860,37733}, {21674,21682}, {24386,31397}, {25522,30315}, {28190,37299}, {28194,38078}, {28204,38070}, {28538,38091}</p>
<p>
X(38058) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3679, 37701}, {21155, 38157}, {38062, 38214}, {38109, 38129}, {38114, 38178}, {38206, 38212}<br>
X(38058) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (21155, 38134), (38033, 38114), (38039, 38109), (38056, 38206), (38109, 38183)<br>
X(38058) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 38042, 34122), (1698, 37710, 4999), (9956, 24987, 4187), (38100, 38105, 38027), (38105, 38214, 38062), (38129, 38183, 38039)<br>
</p>
